text: Stefan Dimitrov (December 9, 1957 – June 2011) was a Bulgarian weightlifter. He won the Silver medal in 60 kg category in the 1980 Summer Olympics in Moscow. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Bulgarian male weightlifters Category:Olympic weightlifters of Bulgaria Category:Olympic silver medalists for Bulgaria Category:Olympic medalists in weightlifting Category:Weightlifters at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1980 Summer Olympics
title: Stefan Dimitrov (weightlifter)
